greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = a(n-1)-(n+2) if this is positive and has not already appeared, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1)+(n+2).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
maple: if t > 0 and not member(t,S) then
program: if x>0 and x not in l: l.append(x)
